title: Lakshmi Temple Stud Earrings - Divinely Crafted Karnaphoolu
features: Intricate temple design featuring a detailed Lakshmi figurine. The openwork frame showcases delicate floral motifs adorned with glittering Cubic Zirconia. Topped with a faceted emerald, showcasing the goddess Lakshmi, believed to bring prosperity and good fortune. Finished with Hyderabadi polish for a lustrous shine.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Also suitable for adding a touch of tradition to modern attire for parties and gatherings.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship, symbolic design representing wealth and prosperity, high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty, versatile for traditional and contemporary outfits.
